# W7701-217344-3 Development of Photon Counting Spectral Detectors

## Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS3793402088-Doc4104334725

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued by Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), for the development of photon counting spectral detectors.

### Contract Overview

The proposed project aims to develop a photon counting spectral detector with a large dynamic range for application in spectral LIDAR. The device will be located in Valcartier, Québec, Canada, as outlined in Annex A.

### Requirements and Submissions

Bidders are required to submit all necessary documentation and bid submissions no later than 2:00 PM EST on September 14, 2023. Any bids received after this date and time will be considered non-responsive.

### Background

This tender cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number Doc3800920934, dated January 9, 2023, with a closing date of February 6, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation.

### Contracting Entity and End User

The contracting entity is Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the end-user is Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC).

### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Julie Desforges at julie.desforges@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
